TopicTitle: Loading Screen and Tracking Station Bug???

Articles.Content:
This is fresh install and this happened on my last version install also. I have windows 7 32bit single core, amd athlon 64 3800+, ATI Radeon Xpress 1150 graphics. Sorry for the links but for some reason my images wouldn't dislplay.
